mapper.insert: insert into comment_tb (recipe_id, target_type, target_id, user_id, content, create_dt, update_dt) values (#{targetId}, #{targetType}, #{targetId}, #{userId}, #{content}, now(), null)
mapper.select: select ct.comment_id, ct.target_id as recipe_id, ct.user_id, ut.username, rt.title as title, ct.content, ct.create_dt, ct.update_dt from comment_tb ct join user_tb ut on ut.user_id = ct.user_id join recipe_tb rt on rt.recipe_id = ct.target_id where ct.target_type = 'RECIPE' and ct.target_id = #{recipeId} order by ct.comment_id desc

select ct.comment_id, ct.target_id as recipe_id, ct.user_id, ut.username, rt.title as title, ct.content, ct.create_dt, ct.update_dt from comment_tb ct join user_tb ut on ut.user_id = ct.user_id join recipe_tb rt on rt.recipe_id = ct.target_id where ct.user_id = #{userId} and ct.target_type = 'RECIPE' order by ct.comment_id desc

select ct.comment_id, ct.target_id as recipe_id, ct.user_id, ut.username, rt.title as title, ct.content, ct.create_dt, ct.update_dt from comment_tb ct join user_tb ut on ut.user_id = ct.user_id join recipe_tb rt on rt.recipe_id = ct.target_id where ct.comment_id = #{commentId} and ct.target_type = 'RECIPE' limit 1
